column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of my favorite restaurants in the city! Always get the sangria and the brussels sprout salad (#22)
column2: or goat cheese baked in tomato sauce (#32). They have amazing small desserts and port wine
column3: as well. Definitely get a reservation on the weekend
column5: but worth the call ahead and the wait. Also
column7: so you can eat at it!
